content: the autumn ankle warmers are a super quick beginner knitting project and perfect for adding a bit of warmth and hand-knit personality to your fall outfits if you make your own #autumnanklewarmers please tag me @kisskiss rhinestones on instagram so i can see your projects <3 sizes one size finished dimensions circumference top / bottom 20 / 40 cm length 21cm gauge 32 sts x 30 row = 10x10 cm in 1x1 rib on 3 5mm double pointed or circular needles note that since the ankle warmers are stretchy you will probably get away with a gauge that is slightly too small or slightly too big yarn requirements 100g of sandnesgarn peer gynt 91m/50g or equivalent for reference mine are knit in col 2730 glossary co = cast on k/ p = knit/ purl m1l = make 1 left i e insert your needle under the bar between your stitches from front to back and knit though the back loop
